testCase.name: Snapshot with default image and finished book
Click event works
NavBarWithSearch should render with small logo
NavBarWithSearch should render with large logo
NavBarWithSearch should render with login button initially
NavBarWithSearch should render with logout if authenticated
Clicking on the image displayed the logout button
Clicking on cross or search button, the search bar should call on click cross
Clicking on cross or search button, the search bar should call on click cross
Label should be equal to the passed value
Select should display the value picked from dropdown menu
Clicking on search button displays the search bar
Label should be equal to the passed value
Placeholder should be equal to the passed value
Enter values in form changes form state
Navbar should render with small logo
Navbar should render with large logo
Navbar should render with login button initially
Navbar should render with logout if authenticated
Clicking on the image displayed the logout button
Clicking on My Library calls setFilterTerm
Card in tabs is rendered
setSearchTerm must be called if search term needs to be set
If search term is non empty search result is displayed
If search result is empty Nothing found for xyz is displayed
Filter must be set
isInLib returns false if not in lib and true id in lib
Add to library function adds book to libraryBooks
Change read status changes the status of each book
Snapshot menu list
Snapshot menu list with random names
Default card in library
Default card not in library
Default card in library finished reading
Snapshot with default image and finished book
Snapshot with passed image and unfinished book
Fire event button click changes status from Mark as finished to read again
Fire event button click changes status from Add to library to Mark as finished
Fire event button click changes status from Read Again to Mark as Finished
Switch tabs when clicked on a different tab
Should print text passed as child prop
If value is 0 the first tab should be active
If value is 1 the second tab should be active
Snapshot horizontal list
Snapshot vertical list
Button name should equal the children prop
Button must have attribute end icon if endIcon needed prop is passed
Button must have big logo if big is passed in props
Button must have small logo if small is passed in props

Snapshot for small logo

Snapshot for up arrow
Normal button
useSearch when empty returns all books
useSearch when no matches returns all books
useSearch when matches returns only matching books
Should print text passed as child prop
Should not print text passed as child prop if value and index are not same
Placeholder should be equal to the passed value
Add book button is rendered initially
Dialog box opens if add book button is clicked
Change value in the text field is reflected on screen
Pressing the close button closes the dialog box
If add book clicked on an empty form, an alert is thrown
If add book clicked after adding all fields then book is added to library
Use books reads form 3 different apis
Dropdown menu appears if clicked on the button and disappears when clicked on button again
Click on menu will fire an event and close the dropdown
